title: 求大神帮忙解决！！
author: 匿名
txt_content:
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  VIP3:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - -essentials.me
    - serversigns.admin
    - chestcommands.open.menu.yml
     - essentials.fix
    - essentials.fly
    - plotme.use
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - RandomLocation.Us
    - RandomLocation.Use
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - world
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    - builder
    info:
      prefix: '&d&l[VIP.3]'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - -essentials.me
    - serversigns.admin
    - chestcommands.open.menu.yml
    - plotme.use
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - RandomLocation.Us
    - RandomLocation.Use
    - world
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  VIP4:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - -essentials.me
    - chestcommands.open.menu.yml
    - serversigns.admin
    - essentials.fix
    - essentials.fly
    -  plotme.use
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - RandomLocation.Us
    - RandomLocation.Use
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - world
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:

    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP1:
    default: false
    permissions:
     - -bukkit.command.kill
    - -essentials.me
    - serversigns.admin
    - chestcommands.open.menu.yml
    - essentials.fly
    - plotme.use
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - RandomLocation.Us
    - RandomLocation.Use
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - world
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    info:
      prefix: '&B&L[VIP.1]'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  VIP2:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - -essentials.me
    - chestcommands.open.menu.yml
    - essentials.fly
    - serversigns.admin
    -  plotme.use
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - RandomLocation.Us
    - RandomLocation.Use
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - world
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    - builder
    info:
      prefix: '&a&l[VIP.2]'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Li_Fish:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.me
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    - serversigns.admin
    - pvptitles.chat
    - pvptitles.ladder
    - pvptitles.rank
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - serversigns.use.*
    - '{inheritance=null}'
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  飞行:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - fly
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefux: '&f[&c造物主&f]&c'
      prefix: ''
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  OP:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.author: Тιмγα姬
replies.txt_content: 这些都是什么鬼，我看不懂

replies.author: qwe1387014
replies.txt_content: 是groups文件里的配置内容，求大神帮忙看看不能打开
ESS的权限组插件...但问题是什么

replies.author: qwe1387014
replies.txt_content:
15253540 发表于 2015-8-15 12:31
ESS的权限组插件...但问题是什么
进入后，玩家包括op没传送权限

replies.author: qwe1387014
replies.txt_content: 是不是哪里弄错了？我就删了个权限

replies.author: qwe1387014
replies.txt_content:
15253540 发表于 2015-8-15 12:48
以下来自1.8中测试得出：
1.手动输入
mangaddp OP tp
我试试{:10_500:}

以下来自1.8中测试得出：
1.手动输入
mangaddp OP tp
mangaddp Admin tp
mangaddp Default tpa
2.命令方块输入
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~1 ~-1 ~ ~1 ~-4 ~ minecraft:redstone_block},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~1 ~2 ~ ~ ~-3 ~ minecraft:air},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:mangaddp Default tpa},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:mangaddp Admin tp},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:mangaddp OP tp}}}}}}}

replies.author: qwe1387014
replies.txt_content: 对了，不只是tp没用连回主城回家也没权限{:10_503:}

replies.author: mcmyu_s
replies.txt_content: 你把op权限给撤掉了，有op也没用，改回来吧
